<denchmark-link:https://github.com/marcoabreu>@marcoabreu</denchmark-link>
   Seems similar to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/10601>#10601</denchmark-link>
  and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/11091>#11091</denchmark-link>

  . Could there be an issue with that ?
